import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Formulario = () => { const [name, setName] = useState('Juan'); const [surname, setSurname] = useState('Simp'); const [email, setEmail] = useState('caballo@GMAIL.COM'); const [password, setPassword] = useState('12345678'); const [address, setAddress] = useState('Calle La Caballería'); const [prov, setProv] = useState('MA'); const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date().toString()); const [age, setAge] = useState(''); const [vehicule, setVehicle] = useState('Coche'); const [agree, setAgree] = useState(false); return (
              Registro de usuario             
setName(juan.target.value)} />
); }; export default Formulario;
